movies.title: HIT: The Third Case
movies.cast: Nani, Srinidhi Shetty, Karthi (Cameo), Adivi Sesh (Cameo)
movies.crew: Sailesh Kolanu (Director, Writer), Prashanti Tipirneni (Producer), Nani (Producer), Mickey J. Meyer (Music), Sanu John Varghese (Cinematography)
movies.plot: HIT: The Third Case is a Telugu action thriller directed by Sailesh Kolanu, the third installment in the HIT franchise. It follows Arjun Sarkaar, a top Homicide Intervention Team (HIT) officer from Visakhapatnam, assigned to investigate a series of brutal murders in Jammu and Kashmir. As he pursues a group of elusive killers, the case tests his skills and mental strength, leading to a thrilling narrative filled with intense action and shocking twists.

movies.title: Jack (Konchem Krack)
movies.crew: Bommarillu Bhaskar (Director), B. V. S. S. Prasad (Producer), Achu Rajamani, Sam C.S., Suresh Bobbili (Music), Vijay K. Chakravarthy (Cinematography), Navin Nooli (Editor), Kolla Avinash (Art Director)
movies.plot: Jack (Konchem Krack) is a Telugu action thriller directed by Bommarillu Bhaskar. The film stars Siddhu Jonnalagadda and Vaishnavi Chaitanya in lead roles. It follows the story of Jack, an enigmatic character navigating through a series of high-stakes situations.

movies.title: Odela 2
movies.cast: Tamannaah Bhatia, Hebah Patel, Vasishta N. Simha, Murali Sharma
movies.crew: Ashok Teja (Director), D Madhu (Producer), Sampath Nandi (Writer), B. Ajaneesh Loknath (Music), Soundararajan (Cinematography)
movies.plot: Odela 2 is a supernatural thriller that continues the story from its predecessor. The film delves into mysterious events unfolding in the village of Odela, with new characters and darker secrets.

movies.title: MAD Square
movies.plot: MAD Square is a Telugu comedy-drama that explores the chaotic lives of individuals connected through a central square in the city, leading to humorous and heartfelt moments.

movies.title: Robinhood
movies.cast: Nithiin, Sree Leela, Shine Tom Chacko, Rajendra Prasad, Vennela Kishore
movies.crew: Venky Kudumula (Director), Naveen Yerneni, Y. Ravi Shankar (Producers), G. V. Prakash Kumar (Music), Chandrabose (Lyricist)
movies.plot: Robinhood is an action crime thriller featuring Ram, a master thief who unexpectedly becomes the personal security officer for Neera, leading to a series of comedic and action-packed events.

movies.title: Manamey
movies.cast: Sharwanand, Krithi Shetty, Rahul Ramakrishna, Seerat Kapoor, Rahul Ravindran, Ayesha Khan, Vennela Kishore
movies.crew: Sriram Aditya (Director, Writer), TG Vishwa Prasad (Producer), Hesham Abdul Wahab (Music), Vishnu Sarma (Cinematography), Krithi Prasad (Creative Producer), Vivek Kuchibhotla (Co-Producer)
movies.plot: Manamey is a romantic comedy-drama that follows the journey of two contrasting individuals brought together by fate, leading to an epic journey filled with love and self-discovery.

movies.title: Shanmukha
movies.plot: Shanmukha is an adventure drama thriller that takes the audience on a suspenseful journey filled with unexpected twists and turns.

movies.title: Muthayya
movies.plot: Muthayya is a Telugu comedy-drama that delves into the life of its titular character, exploring themes of ambition, family, and societal expectations.

movies.title: Mechanic Rocky
movies.cast: Vishwak Sen, Shraddha Srinath, Meenakshi Chaudhary
movies.crew: Ravi Teja Mullapudi (Director, Writer), Ram Talluri (Producer), Jakes Bejoy (Music), Manojh Reddy (Cinematography), Anwar Ali (Editor)
movies.plot: Mechanic Rocky is an action comedy-drama featuring Vishwak Sen in a dual role. The film follows Rocky, a mechanic entangled in a series of comedic and action-filled events.
